Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Imposes limits on where licensed adult use dispensing facilities may be located and waivers from such proximity protection
Summary: Provides that licensed adult use dispensing facilities shall be no less than 1,000 feet apart in municipalities with a population of 20,000 people or more, and no less than 2,000 feet apart in municipalities with a population of less than 20,000 people; provides proximity protection waivers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to proximity protection and where licensed adult use dispensing facilities may be located
